title: browser is now crashing after lastest update
content: About 2 days ago browser started having issues crashing
creator: TomCroc007

title: visitor counter not visible in website
content: All of a sudden my visitor counters stopped working in Firefox . I have only ever used Firefox . I checked EDGE browser visitor counter visible . I checked CROME browser visitor counter visible . Cleaned and cleared my Firefox browser . No help . What is going on ?
creator: pboppart

title: Unable to get code email when resetting new password
content: For three days now I've tried to reactivate my FireFox browser on my home desktop PC. Each time I get to the part where it wants me to enter a code from my authenticator Mozilla won't accept it, so I elect to have a code emailed to my GMAIL account, of which that email never is delivered (yes, I've added accounts@firefox.com to my Google Gmail address book.). Eventually my account is locked and I wait till the next day to repeat this process all over again. Why is it this complicated? Unlike Google Chrome, which just works.
creator: jimspielman

title: Can no longer view YouTube videos while in Firefox browser
content: I can no longer view YouTube videos in Firefox browser because they think I have some kind of add blocker installed. I have never installed such a thing and have no idea how to fix what they are demanding I must fix in order to continue with YouTube in the FireFox browser. In the mean time I have to use some other unfamiliar browser just for YouTube. It appears that some kind of incompatibility has evolved in the recent two or three weeks between Firefox and YouTube.
creator: timjurek

title: Foxfire Menu Page?  How to unsubscribe from pop up ads on my desktop?  Foxfire instructions don't work!
content: My desktop is interrupted by Foxfire pop ups from an on line employment service. I want to uninstall their messages/ads, but can't even find the Foxfire menu page. I am not computer literate and am unable to follow instructions that don't seem to work! Please do not write in tech talk!
creator: woodbyrne3

title: printing an image in an AOL email, not an attachment
content: in AOL email on a MAC - if for instance I get an newsletter and the first page has a large picture when I go to print it the first page is blank including the text. Page 2 continues correctly. The only way I can print that image is to take a series of screenshots to cover that area. The email prints correctly in Safari and Chrome, which I don't like to use.
creator: partsrc

title: Firefox Hisotry
content: I've noticed with the latest update of Mozilla,I can't keep the history tab open for more than just a few moments,if I do,Firefox slows down alot,and I have to close history to get it back to normal. This has never happened before with any Firefox update. Is this something that will be fixed in the next update,or is it something else?
creator: dwood318

title: Problemas para ativar atenticação em duas etapas
content: Olá. Eu escaneei o QR Code em dois aplicativos de autenticação em duas etapas (Google e Microsoft) para ativar a proteção extra. Porém, mesmo após instalar a autenticação do Firefox nos programas e digitando corretamente as chaves geradas, sempre o Mozilla Firefox diz que a chave é incorreta. Já repeti os procedimentos diversas vezes apagando e escaneando novamente, mas o erro persiste.
creator: auripacheco
